effect_entries.effect:
Target is forced to only use damaging moves for the next 3–5 turns, selected at random.  Moves that select other moves not known in advance do not count as damaging.

assist, copycat, me first, metronome, mirror move, and sleep talk do not directly inflict damage and thus may not be used.

bide, counter, endeavor, metal burst, and mirror coat are allowed.
effect_entries.short_effect: For the next few turns, the target can only use damaging moves.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Taunts the foe into only
using attack moves.

Taunts the foe into only
using attack moves.

The foe is taunted
into a rage that
allows it to use
only attack moves.

The foe is taunted
into a rage that
allows it to use only
attack moves for two
to four turns.

The foe is taunted
into a rage that
allows it to use only
attack moves for two
to four turns.

The foe is taunted
into a rage that
allows it to use only
attack moves for two
to four turns.

Provoque l’ennemi. L’oblige à n’utiliser
que des attaques pendant 3 tours.

The target is taunted into a rage that
allows it to use only attack moves
for three turns.

The target is taunted into a rage that
allows it to use only attack moves
for three turns.

あいてを　おこらせる。３ターンの
あいだ　あいては　ダメージを
あたえる　わざしか　だせなく　なる。

상대를 화나게 한다.
3턴 동안 상대는 데미지를
주는 기술밖에 쓸 수 없게 된다.

Provoque l’ennemi. L’oblige à n’utiliser que des
attaques pendant trois tours.

Bringt das Ziel in Rage. Dieses kann über
drei Runden hinweg nur noch angreifen.

Enfurece al objetivo para que solo use
movimientos de ataque durante tres turnos.

Provoca il bersaglio inducendolo a usare
solo mosse d’attacco per tre turni.
